headline: Pelosi Is Prepared to Send Impeachment Articles to Senate, Just Not Yet
abstract: Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she would send the charges to the Senate “when I’m ready, and that will probably be soon.”
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Speaker Nancy Pelosi quietly laid the groundwork on Thursday to send impeachment articles against President Trump to the Senate, indicating that the House would “soon” end a weekslong impasse and vote to bring the charges to trial.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
